mapper.sql: a.id, a.file_name fileName, a.file_url fileUrl, a.company_code companyCode, a.remark, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag delFlag
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM qc_t2_files a join qc_t2_file_content c on c.id =a.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
